solution_line_template: Since the pay for a person holding a degree is three times the amount paid for a diploma holder, Jared will earn {degree_multiplier}*${diploma_pay_per_month} = $<<{diploma_pay_per_month}*{degree_multiplier}={jared_pay_per_month}>>{jared_pay_per_month} per month.
In a year with {months_per_year} months, Jared will earn a total of {months_per_year}*{jared_pay_per_month} = <<{months_per_year}*{jared_pay_per_month}={jared_pay_per_year}>>{jared_pay_per_year}
